title: Post-it Doodle Pad, Portable Art Easel, Self-Stick Tabletop Easel Pad, 20 in x 23 in, 20 Sheets/Pad, 2 Pads/Pack (563R-DP)
description: Creativity has no limits with the Post-it Doodle Pad. This portable tabletop art easel has a built-in stand, and folds down for storage when not in use. With ink bleed-through resistant paper, go ahead and let them use markers, colored pencils, crayons, charcoal pencils and colored pens to start imagining. Great for freestyle art, signs, games, learning stations, lists, and more. When the fun is done or when their masterpiece is ready, display it! With an adhesive band across the top, simply tear along the perforated line to remove and adhere sheet to the wall. That’s it! No tape or tacks needed like flip chart paper or easel refill rolls.
